hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"I traveled with the Prophet, Abu Bakr, Umar, and Uthman; they would pray Zuhr and Asr as two Rak'ah and two Rak'ah, not praying before them nor after them." And Ibn Umar said: "If I was going to pray before it or after it then I would pray it complete

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّقْصِيرِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: (What Has Been Related About) Shortening The Prayer During Travels
